projects.title: E-Commerce Platform
projects.description: A full-stack e-commerce solution built with modern technologies. Features include user authentication, payment integration, inventory management, and real-time order tracking.

projects.title: AI-Powered Dashboard
projects.description: An intelligent analytics dashboard that uses machine learning to provide insights and predictions. Built with React and Python, featuring data visualization and automated reporting.

projects.title: Mobile Banking App
projects.description: A secure mobile banking application with biometric authentication, transaction history, and budget tracking. Built using React Native with robust security measures.

projects.title: Task Management SaaS
projects.description: A collaborative project management tool with real-time updates, team collaboration features, and advanced reporting. Supports multiple projects and team hierarchies.

projects.title: Weather Forecast App
projects.description: A beautiful weather application with location-based forecasts, weather maps, and severe weather alerts. Features smooth animations and offline caching.

projects.title: Cryptocurrency Tracker
projects.description: A real-time cryptocurrency tracking application with portfolio management, price alerts, and market analysis. Supports multiple exchanges and coins.
